items.sentence: I want you to know that I don't like doing things like that.
I want you to know that I'll be here as long as you need me.
If there's anybody here who disagrees with me, speak up now.
We've got to get up early tomorrow. We're going on a picnic.
Is there anyplace around here where I can rent a motorcycle?
Tom and his friends will be painting our house next weekend.
I'll be staying here in Australia for at least three months.
Tom and Mary walked down the street together, holding hands.
I didn't get to the station in time to catch the last train.
You aren't very likely to succeed this time either, are you?
You're not very likely to succeed this time either, are you?
You aren't really planning on staying here all day, are you?
I must confess that my theory doesn't account for that fact.
I watched the birds on the balcony while drinking my coffee.
We should give Tom his space until he's ready to talk to us.
You guys need to put those things back where you found them.
Tom rarely reveals his private persona to the outside world.
My hands are so numb with cold that I can't move my fingers.
Could you call my teacher and pretend that you're my father?
Do you think there is any possibility that Tom will do that?
